title: Entertainment Live: Carol Kirkwood joins Strictly; James McAvoy as Frankenstein - BBC News
summary: news and updates for tuesday 18 august .
emmerdale actress kitty mcgeever dies aged 44 .
ratings for online music videos introduced .
one direction and pharrell to play apple music festival .

documents.title: ttfn
text: well , that 's it for another day in the heady world of arts and entertainment .
as ever , thanks for joining us and we hope to see you again tomorrow from 08:30 .
until then .
author: Emma Saunders
Entertainment reporter

documents.title: pre-teen pop band sign record deal
text: fierce panda has signed pesky !
- a seven-piece indie-pop band from ulverton , cumbria .
hardly anything unusual about that until you learn that all the members are aged 11 and 12 .

they 're too young to tour , and the record label - which launched the careers of coldplay and keane - has constructed an `` anti-marketing campaign '' to make sure the youngsters ' faces are n't plastered all over billboards .
the video for their new single , keep me , even features the preteen septet in animated form .
but bbc breakfast managed to grab a few words with the band in person , as they gear up for the physical release of their first ep , smells like tween spirit , in october .
watch the report .

documents.title: sue perkins ' finishes her book
text: the great british bake-off star sue perkins has just signed off the final proofs of her autobiography , and tweeted the results .
but do you think she noticed the tiny error on the front cover ?
sue perkins
sueperkins
final corrections made , book complete .
phew .
i 'm off for a lie-down .

the comedian , who rose to fame as part of a comedy double-act with mel giedroyc , has gone on to write for french and saunders and appeared on programmes including light lunch , supersizers and celebrity big brother .
the blurb for the book says : `` sadly , a recycling 'incident ' destroyed the bulk of my childhood stuff that my mum had kept .
this has meant two things : firstly , dear reader , you will never get to read a poem about corn on the cob .
secondly , it 's left me with no choice but to actually write this thing myself .
`` this , my first ever book , will answer questions such as 'is mary berry real ?
' , 'is it true you wear a surgical truss ? '
and 'does orchestral conducting simply involve waving your arms around ? '
`` most of this book is true .
i have , of course , amplified my more positive characteristics in an effort to make you like me . ''
perkins ' memoir is due out on 8 october - otherwise known as `` super thursday '' , when all the big publishers flood the bookshelves with christmas stocking-fillers .
final corrections made , book complete .
phew .
i 'm off for a lie-down .

documents.title: electro-funk master
text: talking heads lead singer david byrne is curating the meltdown festival in london this week , and he will be performing the music of a little known nigerian musician william onyeabor .
in the 1970s , onyeabor brought the latest in synthesiser technology and self-produced several albums before he became a born-again christian and stopped .

decades later , his music was re-discovered and while onyeabor did not want to perform his music himself , he has given his blessing for byrne and a group of musicians to perform some of his tracks on thursday night .
author: BBC Radio 4 Today

documents.title: first glimpse of james mcavoy as frankenstein
text: the first trailer for 20th century fox 's latest retelling of mary shelley 's frankenstein has just been uploaded to youtube .
starring james mcavoy as the .
scientist and daniel radcliffe as his devoted protege igor strausman , the movie focuses on their relationship just as much as the famed monster ( although we get a glimpse of him , too ) .

documents.title: stewart up for a fight
text: after 16 years hosting the daily show in the us , you might be forgiven for thinking jon stewart would indulge himself with a well-earned rest .
but no - stewart 's next job is hosting summerslam this sunday on the wrestling channel wwe network .
stewart is a well-known wrestling fan , having had a mock fall-out with wrestler seth rollins on the daily show and later on wwe 's raw show in march .
summerslam is a professional wrestling pay-per-view event - matches include rollins v john cena and brock lesnar v the undertaker .
but will stewart have the nerve to step into the ring ?

documents.title: sheeran is spotify smash
text: singer ed sheeran has topped spotify 's list of the top 25 most influential artists under the age of 25 , after becoming the company 's most streamed artist of 2014 .
the list also included ariana grande , sam smith , miley cyrus and one direction in the top five .
sheeran also had spotify 's most streamed song since the service began , with thinking out loud streamed 450 million times .
perhaps that will give sheeran fans something to talk about other than his controversial

documents.title: foreign import
text: italy 's culture minister has announced that a german will run the prestigious uffizi gallery in florence after the government allowed non-italians to apply for top museum positions for the first time .

eike schmidt , who has worked at the j paul getty museum and the national gallery of art in the us , will take over the helm at the uffizi , which houses works such as botticelli 's the birth of venus .

documents.title: lineker debut

fellow former footballers rio ferdinand , paul scholes and glenn hoddle will join gary in the studio , while ian darke and michael owen will be commentating .
lineker will continue to host match of the day for the bbc .

documents.title: banksy strikes again ?
text: huge structures set up on a derelict site in north somerset have `` all the hallmarks '' of banksy , according to an expert on the street artist .
richard jones said it had been rumoured a banksy show would take place in the area in august .
unconfirmed reports suggest banksy has been creating a new `` pop-up '' exhibition on the former tro lido site in the seaside resort , weston-super-mare .
a castle and sculpture made from tanker trucks can be seen above the walls .
locals had been told that a hollywood company was filming there .
watch this space .

documents.title: professor `` spending a year living as david bowie ''
text: there 's a starman waiting in the cafeteria of a british university .
that 's because will brooker - a film and cultural studies expert at london 's kingston university - is spending an entire year living as david bowie .
he 's attempting to gain a greater understanding of the enigmatic pop lizard by adopting his eating habits , reading the same books he reads , and dressing in his clothes .
he 'll even sample the star 's dubious 1970s diet of milk , red peppers and cocaine ( only the cocaine is being substituted for energy drinks ) .

`` the idea is to inhabit bowie 's head space at points in his life and career to understand his work from an original angle , while retaining a critical and objective perspective at the same time - a kind of split persona perhaps , ''
however , he acknowledged that he ca n't replicate the star 's lifestyle completely .
`` his mansion in beckenham has been demolished , for instance , and i 'm unlikely to have a fling with mick jagger . ''
you can follow his progress

documents.title: flight of the conchords movie planned
text: new zealand comedy duo flight of the conchords have been pretty busy since calling time on their cult hbo sitcom in 2009 .
bret mckenzie won an oscar for the song `` man or muppet '' , while his partner jemaine clement appeared in men in black , rio and the vampire mockumentary what we do in the shadows .
but they 're finally reuniting to make a film about their hapless , hopeless rock band .
`` we have actually started writing [ a film ] , '' clement told indiewire .
however , he added : `` who knows if it will ever be made , we 've written some notes for some different film ideas .
we 're not down to the stage where we 're going , 'the film is going to be like this , ' it could be this , this , this , this , this . ''
here 's a reminder of their greatest `` hits '' .

documents.title: dad 's army remake `` justified ''
text: daniel mays , known for his roles on ashes to ashes and made in dagenham , has defended the new dad 's army film , saying `` the characters are so rich it justifies a remake '' .
`` it 's so well loved , it 's a national institution , those original actors were so wonderful in their roles .
i think , '' he told bbc 5 live , adding : `` the fact it 's a film gives it brilliant scope . ''
the actor ( above - far right ) plays the role of private walker , who was portrayed by james beck in the original tv series .
he says `` he did n't stop laughing '' during filming , alongside the likes of michael gambon , blake harrison and bill nighy .

documents.title: gig cancellations
text: there must be something in the water - bands appear to be cancelling gigs left , right and centre .
first up , a jon bon jovi show scheduled for saturday in vancouver , canada , has been called off .

a spokesperson from bon jovi tours inc. blamed local promoters although paper rain perfomances said in a statement : `` we requested a postponement of the concert as we needed more time to sell it out .
unfortunately for everyone involved , the artist 's management could not agree on a postponement .
we continue to be optimistic about the possibility of re-scheduling the concert in stanley park . ''
it 's a longer-term problem for nickelback , who have been forced to cancel all remaining dates for the 2015 no fixed address tour due to lead singer chad kroeger 's ongoing throat problems .
kroeger , who was diagnosed with an intracordal cyst on his voice box in june , recently underwent surgery and must rest his voice for the next six to nine months in order to fully recuperate .
doctor 's orders .
production problems are to blame for the cancellation of 11 shows by julian casablancas + the voidz .
`` in order to make this work , we needed many pieces to fall into place that just did n't , '' the band said in a statement .
oh dear .

documents.title: perrie opens up on zayn split
text: little mix popped up on james corden 's us chat show last night , where singer perrie edwards was asked about her recent split from zayn malik .
`` it 's been a tough few weeks , are you alright ? ''
corden asked the star , giving her an affectionate cuddle .
`` do you know what ? ''
she replied .
`` i 'm good . ''
`` i wake up every day and i thank my lucky stars i have these three girls . ''
the band then performed their hit single black magic - dancing through the studio audience before being accosted by four escapees from a nearby gym .

documents.title: brian eno to deliver john peel lecture
text: musical polymath brian eno is to deliver the john peel lecture at this year 's radio festival .
the speech , organised by bbc 6 music , focuses on the state of the music industry - with previous speakers including iggy pop , charlotte church and billy bragg .
eno 's talk will `` examine the ecology of culture '' and how a vast array of people - from djs to lawyers - shape the music we hear .

the musician started his career with roxy music , has gone on to produce records for david bowie , devo u2 , coldplay and grace jones , as well as making influential solo records such as music for airports .

eno , whose full name is brian peter george st. john le baptiste de la salle eno , said : `` i 'm honoured to be invited to do a talk in the name of john peel , a man who had a profound effect on my musical life and indeed my becoming a musician at all .
`` his career as a non-musician who altered the course of music has been an inspiration to me and forms the basis of this talk . ''
the lecture will be broadcast live from the british library by bbc 6 music on 27 september .

documents.title: mike leigh honour
text: mike leigh is to be honoured at this year 's zurich film festival with their tribute to award .
leigh will collect his prize in person at a ceremony at the zurich opera house on 3 october .
the festival will also screen several of his works , while leigh will also host a masterclass .
leigh 's best-known films include secrets and lies , vera drake , and more recently , mr turner , starring timothy spall .
the festival will run from 24 september until 4 october .
the full programme has yet to be announced .

documents.title: kathy comes home
text: `` i am done obeying orders , phil .
i need your help and i do n't have much time . ''
with those brief words , kathy beale made her formal return to eastenders last night .
one of the soap 's longest-running characters , she debuted in the very first episode and survived until 2006 when she was - supposedly - killed off in a car crash .
little is known about her return , never mind her resurrection , but 6.2 million people tuned in to watch gillian taylforth reprise her role in last night 's episode .

pictures released by the bbc show that her reappearance is n't completely welcome - with her ex-husband phil mitchell locking her in a garage while he works out how to break the news to their son , ben .
the story continues tonight
meanwhile , over on itv , 7.2 million people watched paddy mcguiness ' debut as `` outdoors enthusiast '' dougie ryan on coronation street .
although it seems not everyone knew who he was

documents.title: bob dylan has a brand new bed
text: a couple of weeks ago , us website clickhole - which parodies social news sites like buzzfeed and gawker - launched a crowd-funding campaign for bob dylan .
their random aim to buy him a comfortable bed .
`` for over 50 years , bob dylan has been one of the most celebrated figures in american music .
his songs have redefined genres and given voice to generations , '' they wrote .
`` he has given us everything while asking nothing in return , and for that , we think it 's about time that america said 'thank you . ' ''
fans who pledged money were promised rewards such as `` a drawing of bob dylan whispering your name into a can of pepsi '' .
the campaign has now exceeded its target of $ 1,360 ( £ 865 ) and a bed has been shipped to mr dylan .
the extra money was used to buy a duvet cover .
`` the scheduled delivery date is tuesday , august 18 , '' said the editors on the

documents.title: keeley hawes lands durrell role
text: ashes to ashes and line of duty star keeley hawes will lead the cast in itv 's new six-part series the durrells , based on gerald durrell 's classic trilogy of corfu memoirs including my family and other animals .
set in the 1930s , hawes will play gerald 's mother louisa durrell , a woman whose life is in meltdown .
her husband died years ago and his money has nearly run out - buit she still has four unruly older children to deal with .
an american in paris and gigi actress leslie caron also stars as the exotic countess mavrodaki , who employs one of louisa 's daughters as her companion .
hawes said : `` i 'm delighted to be playing louisa durrell .
as a life long fan of gerald durrell 's wonderful books , i ca n't wait to start filming and telling his stories through simon nye 's hilarious and poignant adaptation . ''
filming will take place in corfu from september .
nice gig !

documents.title: boy george is a tom jones fan
text: the voice 's newest coach , boy george , has expressed his admiration for sir tom jones after the welsh star was dropped from the judging panel .
george tweeted :
`` i have absolute respect for tom jones .
the man is an absolute legend .
huge fan ! ''

sir tom revealed last week that he was told `` with no consultation or conversation of any kind , that i would not be returning '' to the voice - before describing the behaviour of the bbc executives involved as `` sub-standard '' .

in response to tom 's comments , the bbc said : `` the final decision on the coaches line up for series five of the voice was only taken on wednesday and tom 's team was informed early yesterday ( thursday ) morning .
`` we then announced it to the press so that it did n't leak .
this has been the same every year and no role was ever promised . ''

documents.title: beatles recording contract up for auction
text: the beatles ' first-ever recording contract is to be sold in new york next month .

signed in hamburg , where the band cut their teeth as a nightclub act , it spawned the single my bonnie - which was released on polydor in germany under the name `` tony sheridan and the beat boys '' .
according to legend , a liverpudlian fan requested an import of the single - bringing the band to the attention of record store manager brian epstein , who then steered the beatles to success .
the six-page contract is expected to fetch $ 150,000 ( £ 95,722 ) at heritage auctions in new york on 19 september .
the auction also includes a signed copy of the band 's first uk single , love me do , and a postcard ringo starr sent to his mother from hamburg .

documents.title: on-screen diva
text: oscar winner jennifer hudson is in talks to play aretha franklin in a biopic that straight outta compton producer scott bernstein is developing ,

the untitled aretha franklin project will examine the legendary singer 's rise to fame in the 1960s and 1970s and look into her difficult relationship with her ex-husband and former manager ted white .
hudson most recently appeared in fox 's hit tv series empire .
she won an oscar for her role in dreamgirls in 2006 , having first found fame as a finalist on american idol .
let 's hope she treats this role with some r-e-s-p-e-c-t .

documents.title: emile hirsch starts jail sentence
text: actor emile hirsch has begun a 15-day jail sentence after pleading guilty to assaulting a female studio executive .

the 30-year-old , who rose to fame in sean penn 's drama into the wild , was also given 50 hours of community service and a fine of $ 4,750 ( £ 3,048 ) as part of a plea deal agreed with the prosecutors .
daniele bernfeld , an executive for insurge pictures , told police hirsch grabbed her in a chokehold at a nightclub during the sundance film festival .
he then pulled her across the table and slammed her on the floor , putting his hands around her throat .
ms bernfeld described the incident as being `` insanely painful and absolutely terrifying , '' and said the actor 's punishment did not go far enough .

documents.title: cilla cortege
text: the cortege route of cilla black 's funeral on thursday has been announced .

the family of the entertainer , who died on 1 august , has asked for anyone wishing to pay their respects to line the two-mile route using the whole length of woolton road as far as blackwood avenue .
they have asked people not to travel to woolton village as the church is very secluded and the public will not be able to access it or its grounds .
the cortege will proceed from the road 's junction with church road north .
the funeral will be held at st mary 's church at 13:00 bst .

documents.title: guess the title
text: vin diesel has confirmed the title of the next fast & furious film and it 's an inspired piece of branding .
the eighth instalment of the action series , which will be released in april 2017 , will be called drum roll wait for it fast 8 .
bet you did n't see that coming .

documents.title: scooby-doo , where are you ?
text: good news scooby-doo fans - after more than 12 years , warner bros are bringing scooby and his fellow detectives back to cinemas .
you 'll have to be patient though - the animated feature is not set for release until 21 september , 2018 .
tony cervone , who has directed several straight-to-dvd scooby films , will helm the big screen effort .
according to the hollywood reporter , warner bros are hoping the movie leads to a series of films featuring fred , velma , shaggy et al .
let 's just hope scrappy does n't have a cameo .
author: The Hollywood Reporter

documents.title: emmerdale stars pay tribute to kitty mcgeever
text: the cast of emmerdale has reacted with shock and grief to the news that their co-star kitty mcgeever has died , aged 44 .
mcgeever played the forthright lizzie lakely from 2009 - 2013 , and was the first blind actress to be cast in a british soap .
the actress and stand-up comedian had suffered serious health problems for years , including diabetes and kidney failure .
she died on sunday night , surrounded by her family , said emmerdale 's producers in a statement .
many of her soap opera colleagues paid tribute on twitter .

documents.title: video ratings
text: there 's been much discussion about raunchy and violent music videos in recent years and it 's just been announced that most online music videos will now get age ratings in the same way films do .
the `` big three '' record labels - sony , universal and warners - will send videos to the british board of film classification ( bbfc ) before putting them on youtube and vevo .
these age ratings will only be applied to music videos produced in the uk .
of the 132 videos submitted to the bbfc during an earlier trial period , 56 were rated 12 and 53 classified 15 .
only one video got an 18 certificate - dizzee rascal 's couple of stacks .
it 'll be interesting to see if artists take any notice of the new rules - will they tone down their videos or just enjoy the publicity from the high age ratings ?
author: BBC Newsbeat
Radio 1 and 1Xtra

documents.title: sunny spells on strictly
text: breakfast 's weather presenter carol kirkwood has just been unveiled as the sixth contestant on this year 's strictly come dancing .
the 53-year-old will swap storm clouds for sequins in september - but she does n't rate her chances .
`` i ca n't dance , i 've only done country scottish dancing so i do n't have a favourite dance , but i like the look of ballroom , '' she said .
five other contestants have already been announced :
this autumn expect a high concentration of glitterballs & a smattering of spray-tans .
carol kirkwood is on strictly !

documents.title: one direction back in london for apple festival
text: one direction will play their smallest uk show in years at the apple music festival next month .
the quartet will play to just 1,700 people at london 's historic roundhouse venue - although the performance will be streamed live to millions around the world .
`` it 'll be great to be back in london and we ca n't wait to perform for our fans in the roundhouse and around the world '' said niall horan in a statement that he definitely wrote himself .
other acts announced for the festival include pharrell , florence + the machine and disclosure .
a slimmed-down , rebranded version of the itunes festival , the apple music event takes place over 10 nights in london .
bonus content is promised on apple 's beats 1 radio station .

text: if you want to comment on today 's stories - or suggest something for inclusion on the live page - there are lots of ways to get in touch .
author: Mark Savage
Entertainment reporter

text: happy tuesday and hello from today 's entertainment live page .
we 'll be keeping you up to date with all the latest news from the world of showbiz , culture and the arts .
hold on to your hats .
( hats optional ) .
author: Emma Saunders
